current_free.title: Boxes: Lost Fragments
current_free.description: Escape a lavish mansion full of mysterious puzzle boxes!

current_free.title: My Night Job
current_free.description: My Night Job sends players into an abandoned building and sicks hordes of monsters on them. Using more than 60 weapons to defend themselves and save as many survivors as possible. But beware – if too many rooms are thrashed, the end may be nigh-er than you originally thought.

upcoming_free.title: Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms
upcoming_free.description: Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms is a Dungeons & Dragons strategy management game uniting characters from throughout the D&D multiverse into a grand adventure.

upcoming_free.title: Turnip Boy Robs a Bank
upcoming_free.description: Turnip Boy is back! This time he’s teaming up with the fearsome Pickled Gang to plan and execute the weirdest heist of all time.
